In this first week, we will cover what you can expect to learn from this course 
and the course logistics: all you need to know about the structure of the 
lectures, exercises, and assessments, what will be expected of you, what you
will learn and what has helped previous participants in excelling in this 
course. Finally, we are installing all the programs and packages we need in
this course.
